content: border with the same yarn you do not need to break the yarn note for a longer stretchier bow block the piece before working the finishing the crochet edging tightens the fabric slightly and can prevent the garter stitch from fully blooming finishing detail using the cc or mc and a size 3 crochet hook work a loose crochet edge around the entire wrap edge insert the hook through each edge stitch between each garter stitch bump pull yarn through and continue all the way around break yarn weave in ends and re-block to set the crochet edge if needed tie the ribbon using the bunny ear method and voilà ready to wear everyday blossom scarf / cowl @èveryday knit 3 congratulations you now have a new perfect knit📸 share your finished look on instagram or tiktok @knittingwitheve tag with #everydaybow and #everydayknitdesign 💌 for questions or feedback feel free to message me on instagram or email knittingwitheve1@gmail com i d be happy to help © èveryday knits 2025 this pattern is for private use only you may not copy redistribute or sell this pattern or sell garments made from it youtube knitting with eve instagram @knittingwitheve everyday blossom scarf / cowl @èveryday knit 4
